Hero.title: I am a Web Developer and Frontend Engineer based in São Paulo, Brazil
Hero.description: For over 10 years combining design and programming to transform ideas into innovative digital products.

Projects.title: iSolve | SPA Platform
Projects.shortDescription: iSolve is a real estate financing and home equity management platform.
Projects.longDescription: iSolve is a real estate financing and home equity management platform that serves more than 1,500 real estate agencies and independent consultants. It was developed using Vue.js, Vuetify, Vuex, Vuetify, Sass and TypeScript, using various resources such as JWT, OAuth, WebSocket.
Projects.myWork: I was responsible for creating the platform's complex user flow and integrations with microservices, defining the best data structures to optimize request performance. I developed most of the user interface components and collaborated in the creation of the Design System. Furthermore, I participated in defining the architecture and carrying out tests, using Mocha, Chai and Cypress.

Projects.title: QuintoAndar | PWA Platform
Projects.shortDescription: The user credit flow is one of the main end-user experiences
Projects.longDescription: The user credit flow is one of the main end-user experiences, covering the entire credit application and analysis process, document authentication and user profile evaluation. It is a micro front-end, developed in React, Redux, TypeScript.
Projects.myWork: Implemented advanced anti-fraud features in the WebApp's credit flow, allowing user authentication via selfie, document verification and data extraction via OCR. Additionally, I optimized all micro front-ends related to the credit experience, significantly increasing the quality and usability of the WebApp.

Projects.title: Instacarro | SSR Platform
Projects.shortDescription: InstaCarro is an online used car sales platform in Brazil.
Projects.longDescription: InstaCarro is an online platform that is revolutionizing the used car industry in Brazil, helping people who want to sell their cars as quickly as possible. The Pricing Guide was developed using React, ContextAPI, Custom Hooks, React Query and TypeScript.
Projects.myWork: I was responsible for defining the architecture, creating the prototype in collaboration with the product team and developing a SPA (Single Page Application) using React and TypeScript, with integration to several microservices. Furthermore, my mission included optimizing performance, applying advanced settings to ensure the best possible experience for the end user.

Projects.title: Ewally | Web Application
Projects.shortDescription: Ewally offers innovative, agile and secure financial solutions for your company.
Projects.longDescription: Ewally offers innovative, agile and secure financial solutions for your company. The Web App is developed using HTML, CSS, WordPress as CMS.
Projects.myWork: I transformed the prototype developed by the UX/UI team into a highly lightweight and performant WordPress theme. I used advanced features, such as customizing plugins and themes, efficient application of actions and filter hooks, and management through wp-cli. I also configured SEO best practices with YoastSEO and was responsible for keeping all WordPress plugins and versions up to date, ensuring compatibility and optimal performance of the application.
